review: I see why people do away with paying for cable with this device.  Sure, there are movies that you pay for, but i doubt anyone has enough time to watch so many movies that it costs more than their cable does.  Even with that, there is so much FREE programming that you don't even need to venture into the paid stuff.This is not Fire Stick's fault, but I'll put it in here for others - I ordered this with the voice control remote.  I didn't find out until after I received and used it, that you can do the voice control remote thing through just about any smart phone using the Fire stick app.  Again, not Fire sticks fault, it's mine for not doing the research earlier.  Had I known this, I wouldn't have ordered the voice control remote and just used the app.Great product though, and well worth the $39!
